author: kfogel
msg: More work on issue #943.  Now libsvn_client knows whether it's dealing
with a local property or a remote one, and errors in the remote case.
and use above new function to convert target if necessary.

author: ghudson
msg: (walk_tree): Stop passing a bogus copyfrom_path to add_file.  The
URL stored in the working dir comes from parameters passed to the
checkout editor, not from the copyfrom information.  And passing
copyfrom_path but not copyfrom_rev isn't valid.
(svn_repos_checkout): We weren't doing anything with the URL
parameter apart from the bogus operation mentioned above, so

author: blair
msg: Support linking against Swig shared libraries when Swig's library
directory is not a standard system library directory.
Define and AC_SUBST on SWIG_LIBSWIG_DIR which is the location of
Swig's swiglib, which is the output of swig -swiglib.
Define and AC_SUBST on SWIG_LDFLAGS which is the directory one up from
Clean up the look of the rule.

author: sussman
msg: Part of issue #896:  make svnadmin and svnlook do the right things too.
* svnadmin/main.c (subcommand_setlog): when setting a new log message,
don't just convert to UTF8 -- convert to LF line endings too.
* svnlook/main.c (get_property): when retrieving an svn: property,
convert raw value from UTF8/LF ==> native locale/eol-style.
